sampleAdVariant.notes: This is a sample ad variant ready to be processed by the pipeline

importToAirtable: 1. Create your Airtable base with the tables defined in config/airtable-schema.json
2. Copy the sample data above into respective tables
3. Replace example.com URLs with your actual image URLs
4. For AdVariant, use the Linked Record fields to connect to Actors, Scenes, and Products
5. Set status to 'pending' to trigger the workflow
6. n8n will automatically process and update the status to 'complete'
testingTips: Start with just 1 actor, 1 scene, and 1 product
Create 3 ad variants (variantNumber: 1, 2, 3) for the same product
Use different actors or scenes for variety
Test the pipeline with manual execution first
Check n8n logs for any errors
Verify images are uploaded to S3
imageRequirements: Aspect ratio: Square (1:1) works best for img2img
Quality: High resolution for best results
Content: Clear, well-lit photos of people or scenes
